Sara Promises To Get Over This 'Kartik Aaryan Thing' & We Wonder How The Actor Will React!
Sara Promises To Get Over This 'Kartik Aaryan Thing' & We Wonder How The Actor Will React!
Sara Ali Khan made quite a noise before her debut film Kedarnath, thanks to Karan Johar’s Koffee With Karan season 6. Ever since she admitted about having a crush on Kartik Aaryan on the show and would like to go on a date with him she has been asked about him every time and she happily answered about it too.
Twitter
In fact, they soon became the most desirable couple of tinsel town and even signed a film together. (Wonder if everything was planned). But looks like Sara wants to get over this Kartik thing. Wonder how will the actor react to this as he thoroughly enjoyed all the attention of Sara.
Twitter
In a recent interview with Vogue magazine, Sara said, she will soon get over this Kartik Aaryan thing,
“If you knew all the thoughts I have but don’t do anything about, I promise we would get over this Kartik Aaryan thing”.
Twitter

Sara and Kartik will be seen next in Love Aaj Kal sequel directed by Imtiaz Alia. The original Love Aaj Kal had Sara’s dad Saif Ali Khan in the lead role opposite Deepika Padukone. On professional front Sara is doing exceptionally well, her first film Kedranath proved she is one of the promising actresses in tinsel town. Simmba did disappoint one bit as we didn't get to see more of her. But the girl sure knows how to be in news with or without films.
Coming back to Sara’s comment on getting over Kartik Aaryan, don’t forget to tell your thoughts about it in the comment box below.
